sentences.en: He was able to get into the building unspotted and unsuspected.
sentences.cn: 他能清白、不受怀疑地走入大楼.

sentences.en: One felt that he had kept himself unspotted from the world.
sentences.cn: 旁人会感到他没被世俗污染.

sentences.en: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, [and] to keep himself unspotted from the world.
sentences.cn: 在神我们的父面前，那清洁没有玷污的虔诚，就是看雇在患难中的孤儿寡妇，并且保守自己不沾染世俗。

sentences.en: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep himself unspotted from the world.
sentences.cn: 在神我们的父面前，那清洁没有玷污的虔诚，就是看雇在患难中的孤儿寡妇，并且保守自己不沾染世俗。

sentences.en: Pure religion and undefiled before our God and Father is this: to visit the orphan and the widow in their distress, and to keep oneself unspotted from the world.
sentences.cn: 纯宗教的虔敬，在我们的神与父面前，这就是访问孤儿和寡妇在危难中，仍然保守自己的清白在这个世界。

sentences.en: There are but two things that chiefly excite us to love woman, an attractive beauty and unspotted fame. ——Miguel de Cervantes.
sentences.cn: 能激发我们去爱女人的，主要有两样东西：动人的美貌和清白的名声。——塞万提斯。

words.tran_cn: 清白的；无瑕疵的；无污点的

trans.tran_cn: 无污点的，没有斑点的，道德上无污点的，无瑕疵的
